public class Bishop extends ChessPieceImp

    • checkDiagonal

      public void checkDiagonal(Collection<chess.ChessMove> validBishopMovesList, chess.ChessBoard board, chess.ChessPosition myPosition, int rowNum, int colNum, int rangeToCheck, int rowOffset, int colOffset)
      This is a helper function for the ValidBishopMoves function
      Parameters:
      validBishopMovesList - List of valid Bishop moves.
      board - Current Chessboard.
      myPosition - The current position of the piece.
      rowNum - Integer that represents the row number of the piece.
      colNum - Integer that represents the column number of the piece.
      rangeToCheck - How many iterations our for loop goes through.
      rowOffset - Whether we are moving right or left.
      colOffset - Whether we are moving up or down.
